name: Drifter_A Turn Right Clone
description:
Hold your finger on the screen to turn. Keep doing it and reach the checkpoints.

If you reach the next checkpoint by just turning once....it's a PERFECT and lets you score more point.

It's a clone of game 'Turn Right' by Avix Game Studio in Argentina.

Please contact me if anyone wants to learn how I make these and please support it motivates me to work.

Thanks
